testcase.name: user_should_signup_with_valid_email
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user clicks email box and input valid data "mv@vm.com".................passed When clicks signup button...................................................passed Then user should not see red message under email box........................passed

testcase.name: user_should_not_signup_with_invalid_email
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user clicks email box and input invalid data "mw"......................passed When clicks signup button...................................................passed Then user should see red message under email box "Please Enter Valid Email Address".passed

testcase.name: user_should_not_leave_email_field_blank
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user leave email field blank...........................................passed Then user should see red message under blank email box "Please Enter Email Address".passed

testcase.name: user_should_input_name_in_name_box
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user input name into name box "Ali"....................................passed Then red message should not display.........................................passed

testcase.name: user_should_not_input_special_character_for_name

failure.message: expected:<[Name can not contain special character]> but was:<[]>

testcase.failure:
Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user use special character in name "Ali*"..............................passed Then user see red message "Name can not contain special character"..........failed

testcase.name: user_should_provide_valid_phone_number

testcase.name: user_should_able_to_signup_with_valid_password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user provide valid password into password box and click signup button "12345".passed Then user should not see red message under password box.....................passed

testcase.name: user_should_not_able_to_signup_with_invalid_password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user provide invalid password into password box or and click signup button "123".passed Then user should see red message under password box "Please Enter Atleast 5 Character Password.".passed

testcase.name: user_should_not_able_to_signup_without_providing_password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user not provide password into password box or and click signup button "".passed Then user should see red message under blank password box "Please Enter Atleast 5 Character Password.".passed

testcase.name: user_should_retype_same_password_to_confirmation_box
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user must type same password to the confirmation box and click sigup button "12345".passed Then user should not see red message under confirmation box.................passed

testcase.name: user_do_not_retype_same_password_to_confirmation_box
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the global trader page.....................................passed When user clicks on Join Now button.........................................passed Given user is on Login_Registration page....................................passed When user type different password to confirmation box and click signup button "123".passed Then user see red message under confirmation box "Password doesn't match!"..passed
